text: Galloping Vengeance is a 1925 American silent western film directed by William James Craft and starring Bob Custer, Mary Beth Milford and Ralph McCullough.Munden p.280 ==Cast== * Bob Custer as Tom Hardy * Mary Beth Milford as Marion Reeves * Ralph McCullough as Jack Reeves * Dorothy Ponedel as Little Wolf * David Dunbar as Duke Granby ==References== ==Bibliography== * Munden, Kenneth White. The American Film Institute Catalog of Motion Pictures Produced in the United States, Part 1. University of California Press, 1997. ==External links== * Category:1925 films Category:1925 Western (genre) films Category:English-language films Category:American films Category:American silent feature films Category:American Western (genre) films Category:American black-and-white films Category:Film Booking Offices of America films Category:Films directed by William James Craft
title: Galloping Vengeance
